reviewtext: performance from such a small piece of equipment. Since having a kid our travel baggage tripled and I couldn't afford to carry my Canon Elan(great one when I bought in 1993) along with my camcoder.I looked around for a small 35mm point & shoot and I decided on Delux edition of this one over Minolta Freedom zoom 125 & 150 because of the price and reviews I read at this site. The delux edition has a more gold look to it and comes with a leather cover, battery, and has a panaromic mode function.Size is a big plus to this one even though the Minolta's looked more appealing to me. The pictures came great as mentioned in lot of other reviews. The best are the ones I took in the night with 'night scene' flash mode. One has to be VERY careful not to shake the camera when taking pictures in this mode.
